title: Browns-49ers MNF Preview (Football 10/7)
description:
John Breech is joined by Jared Dubin to preview Browns-49ers on Monday Night Football. The guys cover Cleveland's start following massive expectations and San Francisco remaining under the radar. They analyze Baker Mayfield's 2nd-year performance, the importance of Jarvis Landry and reliance on Nick Chubb. They also dissect the likely return of Tevin Coleman and evaluate Jimmy Garoppolo before picking the game and choosing totals on player props. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: John Breech and Jared Dubin preview all angles of Monday night's matchup between the Browns and 49ers.
